apiKeysList.headerText1: Your secret API keys are listed below. Please note that we do not display your secret API keys again after you generate them.
apiKeysList.headerText2: Do not share your API key with others. or expose it in the browser or other client-side code.
apiKeysList.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this API key? This action cannot be undone and any application using this key will no longer be able to authenticate.
apiKeysList.createdMessage: Once you close this interface, you will not be able to view this API key again. Please ensure that you copy and save the API key in a safe location. If you do not save the key, you will need to create a new one.

fileList.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the selected files? This action is irreversible and will permanently remove the files.
